ing: 4 leaves kale, stems removed and discarded, leaves torn into bite-sized pieces
des: "This quick and easy recipe makes an excellent side dish with lots of flavor. I became intrigued by kale after having it served to me twice in the past two weeks. My wife and I really enjoyed my new and zesty creation."
ins:
Whisk soy sauce, sesame oil, and garlic together in a bowl.
Place kale leaves in a bowl; drizzle soy sauce dressing over kale. Toss to coat.
